Data: McKay to Sangakkara, no run good length pitching outside off and angling across the left-hander, Sangakkara lets it go through to Wade
McKay to Sangakkara, no run Sangakkara once again plays an outstanding straight drive but McKay gets down low in his follow through and gets a hand on the ball to prevent a boundary
McKay to Sangakkara, no run played from the crease towards point
McKay to Sangakkara, 1 run Sangakkara moves forward and cuts the ball behind point towards third man
McKay to Chandimal, 1 run short and wide outside off, Chandimal goes after the ball, trying to slash it over point, he gets a thick top edge that flies towards third man
McKay to Sangakkara, 1 run the line is on the pads and Sangakkara glances towards fine leg
Hussey to Sangakkara, 1 run bowled flat and full, angling into the left-hander, pushed towards long-on for a single
Hussey to Chandimal, 1 run flat from round the wicket again, Chandimal towards point for a single
Hussey to Sangakkara, 1 run Sangakkara turns the ball off his pads behind square
Hussey to Chandimal, 1 run slightly short, Chandimal goes back in his crease and cuts through point
Hussey to Sangakkara, 1 run Sangakkara stays in his crease, waits for the ball to angle into him, and then taps it off his pads through midwicket
Hussey to Chandimal, 1 run that's short and wide outside off and Chandimal slaps the ball to the fielder on the cover boundary
Christian to Chandimal, 1 run width given outside off and Chandimal slashes, getting a thick edge towards third man, the ball reaches the fielder on one bounce

Christian to Sangakkara, no run Sangakkara pushes the ball with a straight bat towards the bowler, that wasn't hit as firmly as the drives to Hilfenhaus and McKay, so Christian had an easier save to make
Christian to Sangakkara, no run played from the crease towards point
Christian to Sangakkara, 1 run short of a length and Sangakkara moves across his crease and taps the ball towards square leg
Christian to Chandimal, no run played from the crease once again towards point, by the right-hander this time
Christian to Chandimal, no run defended towards the bowler, Christian begins with an economical over
Watson to Sangakkara, 2 runs short of a length and outside off, Sangakkara carves it flat but over the fielder at point
Watson to Sangakkara, no run straighter line from Watson, Sangakkara stays in his crease and plays awkwardly on the off side
Watson to Sangakkara, no run short of a length outside off, Sangakkara moves across his crease and punches towards mid-off
Watson to Sangakkara, no run fuller length on middle stump, Sangakkara stays on the back foot and plays to mid-on
Watson to Sangakkara, no run good length at 133kph, Sangakkara opens the face and plays towards point
Watson to Sangakkara, no run defended towards cover from the crease

Christian to Chandimal, SIX runs he's teed off! Chandimal moved his front leg out of the way and used the length and the width - full and outside off - to cart the ball down the ground with a full swing of the arms, the ball crashed into the sightscreen
Christian to Chandimal, no run defended on the leg side
Christian to Chandimal, no run good length and straight, Chandimal defends on the off side

Christian to Chandimal, 3 runs short and wide outside off, Chandimal cuts hard but I think the fielder at point may have taken some pace off the ball. Doherty runs across from third man to field at deep point
Christian to Sangakkara, 1 run Sangakkara taps the ball towards point and sprints
Christian to Chandimal, no run Chandimal strides forward and defends a good length ball on the off side

Watson to Sangakkara, no run Chandimal's stranded mid pitch but the throw misses at the bowler's end! David Hussey doesn't hit this time. Sangakkara had played the ball straight to midwicket and Chandimal set off, Sangakkara didn't want the run. Chandimal was in the middle of the pitch when he turned around and his only chance was if the throw missed. It did.
Watson to Sangakkara, no run defended on the off side
Watson to Sangakkara, 3 runs Sangakkara moves forward and drives the ball on the up through extra cover, he played that through the line
Watson to Chandimal, 1 run turned off the hips towards square leg for one more
Watson to Sangakkara, no run good length and straight, Sangakkara plays the ball back to the bowler
Watson to Sangakkara, 1 run Sangakkara moves forward and pushes the ball past Watson towards mid-off
Hilfenhaus to Sangakkara, 1 run Sangakkara gets on top of the bounce of a short of a length ball and opens the face to steer towards third man
Hilfenhaus to Chandimal, 1 run good length and very straight, Chandimal plays with soft hands towards midwicket and Sangakkara initiates a quick single
Hilfenhaus to Sangakkara, FOUR runs short of a length with width outside off, Sangakkara moves forward and frees his arms, square driving the ball through point for four
Hilfenhaus to Sangakkara, no run defended back to the bowler
Hilfenhaus to Sangakkara, 1 run Sangakkara moves forward, pushes towards mid-on and runs immediately, the fielder doesn't pick up cleanly

Hilfenhaus to Chandimal, no run loud appeal for lbw but Asad Rauf says not out. That ball nipped into the right-hander from a good length and hit the pad. Possibly a bit high? Maybe an inside edge? I'll have to wait for replays. There was an inside edge as Chandimal closed the face.
Watson to Sangakkara, no run played towards point
Watson to Sangakkara, no run pushed off the front foot towards mid-off
Watson to Sangakkara, 1 run Sangakkara drives the ball from the crease towards midwicket where Doherty doesn't make a clean save and allows the single
Watson to Chandimal, no run full ball on middle stump, Chandimal leans across and plays to midwicket

Watson to Chandimal, FOUR runs that's not short, but Chandimal moves slightly towards the off and heaves the ball with a short-arm pull off the front foot. He hit it flat and in the air between midwicket and mid-on. Chandimal is a little bundle of class.
Watson to Chandimal, no run fuller length on off stump, Chandimal defends on the off side
Hilfenhaus to Sangakkara, no run Sangakkara tries to hit down the ground but gets an inside edge towards midwicket, the ball was fullish and straight
Hilfenhaus to Sangakkara, FOUR runs short of a length with a little width, that's all Sangakkara needs. He slaps the ball with power off the front foot through cover
Hilfenhaus to Sangakkara, 1 run a slower ball outside off, Sangakkara reads it, plays with soft hands close on the off side, and runs
Hilfenhaus to Chandimal, no run good length and straight, defended back to the bowler
Hilfenhaus to Chandimal, 1 run short of a length on off stump, dropped close on the off side for a quick single

Hilfenhaus to Sangakkara, no run ah this time Sangakkara doesn't find the gap. The ball was there to be driven - full outside off - and Sangakkara did so, but hit it to the fielder at cover, David Hussey.
Watson to Chandimal, no run good length and straight, Chandimal plays the ball towards mid-on
Watson to Chandimal, 1 run a slower ball but it's full and on leg stump, Chandimal plays off his pads through square leg
Watson to Sangakkara, no run good length and straight, Chandimal gets behind the line and blocks
Watson to Sangakkara, 1 run Sangakkara waits in his crease and opens the face to play the ball towards third man
Watson to Chandimal, 2 runs a slower short ball, Chandimal swivels and pulls towards deep midwicket, Peter Forrest has a lot of ground to cover and he covers it swiftly
Watson to Chandimal, no run played from the crease towards midwicket
McKay to Sangakkara, 2 runs Sanga uses the angle into him and turns the ball off his pads behind square
McKay to Sangakkara, 1 run Sangakkara drops the ball at his feet and responds to Chandimal's quick call, Warner was the fielder closest to the ball but they took him on
McKay to Chandimal, 2 leg byes that's a super slow ball out of the back of the hand at 108kph, Chandimal gets beaten by the change of pace but the ball brushes his pad and goes towards fine leg
McKay to Chandimal, 2 runs another slow ball and this time Chandimal plays it towards fine leg off the back foot
McKay to Chandimal, 1 run Chandimal closes the face of the bat to play the ball through square
McKay to Sangakkara, 1 run Sangakkara mis-times the hit through cover and the ball plugs into the ground close on the off side, Chandimal sprints through
Doherty to Sangakkara, 1 run Sangakkara moves forward and plays the ball off his pads towards square
Doherty to Chandimal, 1 run Chandimal charges and tries to hit down the ground, he gets an inside edge that goes towards fine leg
Doherty to Sangakkara, 1 run driven from the crease through cover, Doherty is bowling them flat and straight
Doherty to Chandimal, 1 run slower through the air this time, Chandimal taps on the off side and they sprint another single
Doherty to Sangakkara, 1 run worked off the pads behind square for another single, Sri Lanka reach 100
Doherty to Chandimal, 2 runs nudged from the crease towards third man, more quick running between the wickets
McKay to Sangakkara, no run from around the wicket, McKay bowls it in the channel outside off and Sanga pushes to cover point
McKay to Sangakkara, 1 run room outside off and Sangakkara drives but there's a sweeper out on the off side
McKay to Chandimal, 1 run slower ball, short outside off and Chandimal guides it to third man
McKay to Sangakkara, 1 run in the channel outside off, Sanga opens the face at the last moment and gets a single to third man
McKay to Chandimal, no run angled across, Chandimal looks to play straight but goes off the inside half of the bat to midwicket
McKay to Chandimal, 1 run slower and outside off. Chandimal guides it to third man and brings up 1000 runs in ODI cricket
Doherty to Chandimal, SIX runs tremendous hit, tremendous! Chandimal gets under a flighted ball by coming a long way out of his crease and lofts the ball into the stands behind the midwicket boundary
Doherty to Chandimal, 1 run and now he sensibly drives the ball towards long off to rotate strike
Doherty to Sangakkara, 1 run worked off the pads through square leg for a single
Doherty to Chandimal, 1 run bowled flat and wide outside off, Chandimal drives to the fielder on the sweeper boundary
Doherty to Sangakkara, no run played towards square leg
Doherty to Sangakkara, no run whoops, Sangakkara lost grip on his bat as he played that on the leg side and the bat flew in the air behind the keeper, could have been hit wicket there
McKay to Chandimal, no run left alone outside off stump
McKay to Chandimal, no run Chandimal gets an inside edge on to the pad towards the leg side
McKay to Chandimal, 1 run Chandimal gets to his half-century by glancing the ball off his pads towards fine leg. Impressive innings from an impressive youngster. The crowd gives him a huge cheer.

McKay to Sangakkara, 1 run short of a length outside off, Sangakkara steers to third man and the crowd cheers again because Sanga's got to his fifty. It's the 100 run stand as well. Sri Lanka steaming ahead.
McKay to Chandimal, 1 run Chandimal waits on the back foot and slaps a short of a length ball in front of point
McKay to Sangakkara, 1 run the slower ball from round the stumps, Sangakkara moves across his stumps and nudges behind square
Doherty to Sangakkara, 1 run Sangakkara goes back and drives the ball towards long-on
Doherty to Chandimal, no run bowled flat and fast, towards the blockhole, Chandimal stays in his crease and plays to mid-on
Doherty to Chandimal, no run played from the crease towards square leg
Doherty to Chandimal, 1 run pushed with soft hands close on the off side for a quick single
Doherty to Sangakkara, FOUR runs Sangakkara winds up, targets the square leg boundary, and sends the ball there with a powerful sweep from just outside off stump
Doherty to Sangakkara, 2 runs he tries to sweep again but this time gets a top edge that lobs in the air over the keeper
Pattinson to Chandimal, no run short of a length angling into the right-hander, Chandimal stays in his crease and defends on the off side, they decide against the quick single
Pattinson to Chandimal, 1 run fuller ball on off and middle, played towards midwicket
Pattinson to Sangakkara, 1 run Sangakkara moves slightly across and works the length ball through backward square
Pattinson to Chandimal, 1 run short of a length outside off, Chandimal rides the bounce and cuts behind point towards third man
Pattinson to Sangakkara, 1 run Sangakkara move forward to drive the ball and sprints the single after the bowler fails to stop it
Pattinson to Chandimal, 2 runs short ball, Chandimal was on the front foot and he pulled it along the ground towards deep midwicket, they run two before Michael Hussey's throw comes in
Doherty to Sangakkara, no run played off the front foot towards midwicket
Doherty to Sangakkara, 1 run Sangakkara comes out of his crease and dabs the ball towards long on
Doherty to Chandimal, 1 run punched from the crease towards long off for a single
Doherty to Sangakkara, 1 run quicker ball on the stumps, Sangakkara moves back and swats the ball through midwicket
Doherty to Chandimal, 1 run flicked off the pads through square leg
Doherty to Sangakkara, 1 run driven off the front foot towards long-on, superb milking of the spinner
Pattinson to Sangakkara, 1 run length ball on the pads, easy for Sangakkara to glance towards fine leg
Pattinson to Chandimal, no run good length on off stump, Chandimal stays in his crease and defends on the off side
Pattinson to Chandimal, 1 run fuller length on middle and leg, Chandimal stays put and nudges the ball behind square
Pattinson to Sangakkara, no run Sangakkara stays in his crease and plays a good length ball towards cover
Pattinson to Sangakkara, no run good length and straight, defended on the back foot towards the bowler

Pattinson to Sangakkara, OUT caught at deep square leg! Short of a length delivery that hurried Sangakkara who began to swivel pull but then checked his shot, the ball went off the top edge high in the air and straight to Peter Forrest. The partnership ends on 123, it's been a splendid one.
Doherty to Thirimanne, no run played from the crease towards point
Doherty to Thirimanne, 1 run Thirimanne uses his feet, comes out of his crease, and plays towards long-on

Doherty to Chandimal, 1 run Chandimal pushes the ball in front of point on the front foot and continues running, he slides into his crease on both knees and arches back, like a footballer would celebrate a goal
Doherty to Thirimanne, 1 run Thirinamme lunges forward and sweeps through square leg
Doherty to Chandimal, no run defended on the off side
Doherty to Chandimal, 1 run played off the front foot towards long on
Watson to Chandimal, 1 run played with soft hands on the off side for a quick single
Watson to Thirimanne, no run Thirimanne drops the ball behind the stumps but Wade is quick to the ball and prevents the single
Watson to Thirimanne, no run Thirimanne swishes outside off and gets beaten, it's been a while since someone got beaten
Watson to Thirimanne, 1 run played from the crease into the gap at cover for a single
Watson to Chandimal, no run another one beats the bat now, Chandimal was looking to guide a fullish ball towards third man
Watson to Chandimal, no run and again, Chandimal tries to steer towards third man and misses, the ball was quick and on a good length outside off
Christian to Thirimanne, no run full ball angling across Thirimanne, who drives to drive but gets beaten
Christian to Thirimanne, no run Thirimanne tries to cut off the front foot but is beaten once again, everything's beating the bat now.
Christian to Thirimanne, no run and again, Thirimanne goes after a wide delivery but misses the drive

Christian to Thirimanne, 1 run there's an appeal for a run out after a direct hit from Warner. But Thirimanne's just safe, just. Thirimanne played the ball with soft hands behind point and ran, Warner swooped on it and let the throw rip at the bowler's end. The batsman was in by a frame.
Christian to Chandimal, 1 run a slower ball, played towards long on for a single
Christian to Thirimanne, 1 run driven off the front foot through the off side for one more
Watson to Thirimanne, no run Thirimanne works the ball off his pads towards midwicket
Watson to Thirimanne, 3 runs shot! Thirimanne makes a bit of room by moving towards leg and drives a length ball through extra cover, Michael Hussey runs to his left and dives to save a run
Watson to Chandimal, no run Chandimal wants a run after dabbing towards point but Thirimanne says no
Watson to Chandimal, no run played off the pads towards midwicket
Watson to Chandimal, no run a short ball that moved away from the right-hander, Chandimal tried to pull from outside off and was beaten
Watson to Chandimal, no run short of a length and quick outside off, Chandimal tries to cut but is beaten once again
Christian to Thirimanne, 1 run Thirimanne stays in his crease and plays a length ball from off stump towards point
Christian to Chandimal, 1 run length ball angling into the right-hander, Chandimal works it off his pads through square leg
Christian to Thirimanne, no run full ball just outside off stump, Thirimanne tries to drive through cover and is beaten, that nearly bowled him

Christian to Thirimanne, no run short and wide outside off, Thirimanne cuts but straight to Warner on the bounce, Warner sends Chandimal hurrying back into his crease at the non-striker's end with a swift throw
Christian to Thirimanne, 1 run Thirimanne cuts and gets a thick outside edge towards third man, Christian's bowling a lot of slower balls
Christian to Chandimal, 2 runs Chandimal turns the ball off his pads into the gap behind square and runs hard, converting a single into two

Watson to Thirimanne, FOUR runs There's a run out! Chandimal's gone. But the umpire's is checking if Hilfenhaus made a clean save on the boundary. Thirimanne cut the ball hard towards the point boundary, and Hilfenhaus make a sliding save. However as he threw the ball back into play, his foot touched the boundary rope. Chandimal attempted the third run and was run out by a long long way. But he gets a life line. It was a relay throw from Hilfenhaus, he
Watson to Thirimanne, 1 run pushed down the ground for a single
Watson to Chandimal, 1 run played towards backward point for a single
Watson to Thirimanne, no run full ball outside off stump, driven from the crease towards mid off
Watson to Thirimanne, 1 run played off the pads through square leg for a single
Watson to Chandimal, no run short of a length outside off stump, Chandimal tries to cut and gets beaten
Doherty to Thirimanne, no run dabbed from the crease towards point
Doherty to Thirimanne, 1 run played towards fine leg for a single
Doherty to Chandimal, no run Chandimal plays off the front foot towards midwicket
Doherty to Chandimal, 1 run Chandimal tries to make room by moving towards leg, Doherty follows him with a flat ball, Chandimal has to defend on the off side
Doherty to Thirimanne, 2 runs cut off the back foot through point, Thirimanne waited on the back foot and used the room
Doherty to Thirimanne, 1 run Thirimanne pushes the ball towards long on for a single
Pattinson to Thirimanne, 1 run played off the back foot with an open face towards third man
Pattinson to Chandimal, FOUR runs short of a length outside off, Chandimal cuts hard, beating point who dived to his left, and beating Doherty at third man, who ran to his right and dived full length
Pattinson to Chandimal, no run Pattinson responds by hitting a good length just outside off and beating the bat
Pattinson to Chandimal, no run full and wide outside off, Chandimal lays into the ball with a fierce cover drive off the front foot, he made great contact but placed it to the fielder at cover
Pattinson to Chandimal, 1 run too straight from Pattinson, allows Chandimal to glance the ball off his pads to fine leg
Pattinson to Thirimanne, 1 run Pattinson angles the ball into the left-hander from round the wicket, Thirimanne closes the face of the bat and plays to deep backward square
Doherty to Thirimanne, 3 runs Thirimanne steps out of his crease and drives the ball through the gap at cover, not hit hard enough to reach the boundary
Doherty to Chandimal, 1 run nudged off the front foot behind square for a single
Doherty to Thirimanne, no run Thirimanne gets hit on the pad after missing a glance, there's an appeal for lbw but it pitched outside leg stump
Doherty to Thirimanne, no run pushed towards cover from the crease
Doherty to Thirimanne, 2 runs Thirimanne whips the ball past the diving fielder at midwicket and collects two more
Doherty to Thirimanne, no run he sweeps this time but can't beat square leg
Pattinson to Chandimal, 1 leg bye full ball on the pads, Chandimal misses the flick but runs a leg bye after getting hit on the pad
Pattinson to Thirimanne, 1 run Thirimanne makes room and then throws his bat at a short of a length ball outside off, gets a thick edge towards third man
Pattinson to Chandimal, 1 run Chandimal moves his front foot to create hitting space and then swings hard, he mis-times the shot but has enough power on it to just clear Christian at mid-on
Pattinson to Thirimanne, 1 run played towards cover point for a single

Pattinson to Chandimal, OUT caught at mid-off! Chandimal's gone this time. He was on the front foot and he tried to hit down the ground, the length wasn't short enough for that shot and he holed out to McKay at mid-off. He's made 75, an excellent innings. Pattinson's taken his third wicket.
Pattinson to Angelo Mathews, no run full and fast, on off stump, Mathews gets behind the line and defends
Doherty to Thirimanne, 1 run dabbed off the front foot towards cover for a single
Doherty to Angelo Mathews, no run Mathews stays in his crease and defends on the off side
Doherty to Angelo Mathews, 1 run driven from the crease towards long off
Doherty to Thirimanne, 1 run nudged close on the off side for a quick single, the fielders are on the edge of the circle
Doherty to Angelo Mathews, 1 run punched off the back foot towards extra cover, they wait to see if the fielder can stop it before running. He can't, so they run
Doherty to Thirimanne, no run played off the back foot towards point
McKay to Angelo Mathews, 1 run A slower ball on a good length outside off, pushed on the off side for a single
McKay to Thirimanne, no run a slower ball outside off, Thirimanne tries to dab behind point and is beaten
McKay to Thirimanne, 1 run quicker this time, angling into the left-hander from round the wicket, Thirimanne opens the face and steers towards third man
McKay to Angelo Mathews, 1 run another slower ball, from over the wicket to the right-hander, Mathews drops it close to his feet and runs
McKay to Thirimanne, 1 run slow again outside off, Thirimanne makes room by moving towards leg and plays it past point
McKay to Angelo Mathews, 1 run nudged off the hips towards fine leg

Christian to Angelo Mathews, OUT caught, splendidly caught! The ball was a slightly slower one outside off stump and Mathews was on the front foot and into his shot too early. He tried to check it but ended up spooning the ball in the air down the ground. Doherty ran quickly from mid-on towards the boundary, covered a lot of ground, and took the catch as the ball dropped over his head
Christian to Thirimanne, no run Thirimanne tries to cut but is beaten
Christian to Thirimanne, 1 run Thirimanne drives the ball in the air but through cover
Christian to Perera, 1 run played from the crease through cover point
Christian to Thirimanne, 1 run tries to drive through the off side but gets a thick edge towards third man
Christian to Perera, no run slower ball to end the over, defended on the off side
McKay to Thirimanne, 1 leg bye nudged off the pads behind square for a single
McKay to Perera, 1 run Perera was trying to play the ball on the leg but ended up pushing towards cover. He took on David Hussey but would have been short had Hussey hit at the bowler's end
McKay to Thirimanne, 1 run Thirimanne makes room and dabs the ball towards third man
McKay to Perera, 1 run a slower ball cramps Perera for room, he plays on the off side and runs
McKay to Thirimanne, 1 run Thirimanne makes room once again and plays behind point

McKay to Perera, 1 run it's slow again from McKay and Perera pulls towards deep midwicket. Thirimanne begins the second run but then slips, the throw from the deep is poor so he has time to scramble back into his crease. Perera actually began the second and then stopped, forcing Perera to turn around
Christian to Perera, 1 run cut hard from the crease towards third man
Christian to Thirimanne, 1 run slower ball from round the wicket, chipped over the infield at cover

Christian to Perera, OUT caught on the deep midwicket boundary! Michael Hussey takes a special kind of catch, one that is becoming less rare these days. Perera swung hard and hit the ball high towards deep midwicket, Hussey ran back and settled under the ball and took the catch inside play. He realised he was going to go over the boundary so he threw the ball up, stepped over the rope, stepped back in, and caught the ball again.

Christian to Senanayake, OUT lbw! The ball is full and straight, Senanayake moves across his crease and tries to play on the leg side by closing the face of his bat, he misses and is hit in front, that would have clipped leg stump

Christian to Kulasekara, OUT a hat-trick for Christian! He bowled a full ball that swung into the right-hander, Kulasekara did what Senanayake did, moved across and tried to flick. He missed and got hit on the pad, this looked like it was missing leg but the umpire didn't think so. Christian is mobbed by his team-mates.
Christian to Herath, no run full ball from Christian, dug out on the off side
Pattinson to Thirimanne, 1 run full ball on the stumps, Thirimanne makes room and drives through cover point

Pattinson to Herath, SIX runs Herath swings hard at a length ball outside off and gets a top edge that flies down to third man and clears the boundary. Doesn't matter how they come, eh? That ball landed on the rope
Pattinson to Herath, 1 run Herath pulls, a short-arm pull through square leg
Pattinson to Thirimanne, 1 run Thirimanne cuts the ball towards third man for a single
Pattinson to Herath, 1 run Herath is turning on the aggression. He pulls another short of a length ball towards deep square leg. Feisty batting.
Pattinson to Thirimanne, FOUR runs shot! Thirimanne makes room and drives the ball in the air inside out through cover point, placing it wide enough to beat Michael Hussey on the boundary
Christian to Herath, no run played on the off side, the bowler runs across to prevent the single
Christian to Herath, 1 run Herath flays at a full ball outside off stump and gets another outside edge towards third man, along the ground this time
Christian to Thirimanne, 1 run Thirimanne drives firmly to David Hussey at cover, there was a fumble else there could have been a run out
Christian to Herath, no run Herath's swinging at everything now, this one isn't short enough to pull and he gets beaten
Christian to Herath, no run full outside off stump once again, Herath gets beaten
Christian to Herath, 1 run Herath drives a full ball to cover and sets off for a single, he beats David Hussey's throw to the bowler
McKay to Thirimanne, 1 run Thirimanne makes room and opens the face to steer towards third man
McKay to Herath, 1 run Herath opens the face and steers towards third man
McKay to Thirimanne, 1 run slower ball from round the wicket, Thirimanne opens the face and plays behind point again
McKay to Herath, 1 wide a full ball down leg side, Herath moves towards the off and tries to glance but misses
McKay to Herath, 1 run Herath taps the ball towards third man and rotates strike
McKay to Thirimanne, 1 run Thirimanne makes room and dabs another slower ball towards third man
McKay to Herath, no run Herath moves forward and defends a slower ball
Christian to Thirimanne, no run full ball from round the wicket, driven from the crease towards cover
Christian to Thirimanne, 1 run Thirimanne stays in his crease and waits for the ball to reach him before opening the face to play towards third man
Christian to Herath, no run Herath tries to drive through the off but gets an inside edge towards midwicket
Christian to Herath, no run short of a length outside off stump, Herath tries to cut but gets beaten
Christian to Herath, no run in the blockhole from Christian, played back to the bowler
Christian to Herath, no run Herath moves forward and tries to drive a full ball outside off, he gets beaten. A hat-trick in Christian's last over, only one run in this one.
Pattinson to Herath, 1 run full ball on off stump, driven from the crease through point
Pattinson to Thirimanne, 1 run Thirimanne gets to his half-century by cutting to point, the fielder doesn't attempt a throw, perhaps because no one was backing up
Pattinson to Herath, 1 bye full ball outside off stump, Herath gets beaten and Thirimanne steals a bye, Wade throws at the bowler's end to try and run out Herath, he missed
Pattinson to Thirimanne, 1 run Thirimanne throws his bat at a wide out outside off and bottom edges towards third man

Pattinson to Herath, 1 run Herath clears his front foot out of the way and biffs the ball towards long-on, Thirimanne wants the second and begins to run it but is sent back by Herath, Christian's throw to Wade wasn't good, it was wide of the stumps, and Wade missed his throw at the stumps, else Thirimanne would have been run out

Pattinson to Thirimanne, OUT he's been bowled off the middle of the bat! Thirimanne moved across his stumps to try and scoop the ball over fine leg, he made decent contact, but deflected the ball on to his stumps
Christian to Herath, no run wide outside off stump but the umpire doesn't call it
Christian to Herath, 1 bye Herath swings and misses, Wade collects and throws at the bowler's end and misses, he concedes an overthrow towards long-off
Christian to Malinga, 2 runs Malinga makes room and clubs the ball down the ground towards long on, they are sprinting between the wickets and come back for the second
Christian to Malinga, no run Malinga swings and misses, they don't run a bye this time. Wade was keeping with only his left glove on, so that he can throw the ball quicker
Christian to Malinga, no run once again Wade collects with only one glove on after the ball beats the bat, and is ready to throw if the batsmen try to steal a bye
Christian to Malinga, OUT bowled him! Christian finishes with five wickets. Malinga moved way across his stumps to glance towards fine leg and he missed. The ball was straight and hit middle stump.
So Sri Lanka need to keep Australia to 238 or less to make the finals. I'll be back in 30 minutes for the chase.

6.10 pm Sri Lanka have finished with 238, a score that is less than par on this pitch. They were set for at least 40 more when Sangakkara and Chandimal were steering the innings. But they fell away after that partnership. Christian wrecked the innings with a hat-trick and finished with 5 for 31. Pattinson was making a comeback from injury and he took four wickets as well.

I wonder what the Indians are doing now. They will know in a few hours whether they need to head to the airport tomorrow or not. Sri Lanka need to tie or win to make the finals. They have 238 to defend.
Malinga to Wade, 2 runs Malinga begins with a low leg-stump full toss that is clipped off the pads towards deep backward square leg
Malinga to Wade, 1 wide that is a harsh call for wide outside off stump, it wasn't outside those guiding tram lines
Malinga to Wade, FOUR runs another low full toss, outside off stump, Wade moves forward and drives through extra cover, timing it well enough to reach the boundary
Malinga to Wade, no run a slower ball on middle and off, Wade defends on the off side
Malinga to Wade, no run played with an open face towards point, Malinga's length is full again
Malinga to Wade, no run Wade has a go at one that's wide outside off stump and gets beaten
Malinga to Wade, no run Wade moves forward and defends a length ball towards cover point, Malinga controlled damage nicely after a poor start
Kulasekara to Warner, FOUR runs short and wide outside off, hit me please. Warner stays in his crease and cuts the ball through cover to get off the mark
Kulasekara to Warner, 1 run length ball on the pads, Warner moves across and nudges towards square leg
Kulasekara to Wade, no run defended on the back foot towards backward point
Kulasekara to Wade, no run Sanga fumbles the take after the batsman lets it go outside off stump, but the slip fielders mop up
Kulasekara to Wade, 1 run the line is too straight at gentle pace, allowing the batsman to work off the pads towards square leg
Kulasekara to Warner, no run Warner tries to drive on the up but slices it towards point
Malinga to Wade, 1 run a slower ball on middle stump, Wade drops it close on the leg side and the batsmen run a quick single
Malinga to Warner, 1 run length ball around off stump, Warner stays in his crease and steers the ball towards third man
Malinga to Wade, 1 run Wade stands in his crease and opens the face to steer towards third man this time
Malinga to Warner, no run that was measured at 127 kph but it seemed slower, the line was straight. Defended on the off side off the back foot
Malinga to Watson, 2 runs Watson strides forward to a length ball outside off and steers it through the gap between point and backward point

Kulasekara to Wade, OUT lbw! Kulasekara pitched the ball in line with the stumps from over the wicket and angled it across the left-hander, Wade moved across his crease to play on the leg side and was hit on the back pad. Height might have been the only issue but that looked pretty good. The umpire thought so too. The MCG comes to life, there are so many Sri Lankan fans today and they are cheering themselves hoarse. Replays indicate that height was no p
Kulasekara to Forrest, no run short of a length and straight. Defended on the off side
Kulasekara to Forrest, no run Forrest swishes and gets beaten outside off stump
Kulasekara to Forrest, 1 wide that's down leg side and Sangakkara leaps to his left to collect
Kulasekara to Forrest, no run Forrest stays in his crease and opens the face to play behind point
Kulasekara to Forrest, no run good length around off stump, Forrest defends from his crease towards the bowler
Kulasekara to Forrest, 1 run that's too straight, allowing Forrest to whip the ball off his pads towards long leg
Malinga to Forrest, 1 run Forrest is giving the bowler a good view of his stumps, his stance gives him room to play towards point
Malinga to Watson, FOUR runs too full and too straight, Watson moves forward and across to clip the ball with power through midwicket
Malinga to Watson, 1 run short of a length and wide outside off stump, Watson comes forward and cuts towards third man
Malinga to Forrest, no run left alone outside off stump
Malinga to Forrest, no run Forrest gets behind the line of a fuller ball and defends on the off side
Kulasekara to Watson, no run Watson tries to drive through cover but mis-times it into the ground
Kulasekara to Watson, no run Watson tries to steer the ball towards third man but there's a fielder in the way
Kulasekara to Watson, no run played from the crease towards point
Kulasekara to Watson, no run Watson comes forward and defends on the off side
Kulasekara to Watson, no run Watson plays this one towards midwicket, five consecutive dots
Kulasekara to Watson, 2 runs too full and too straight, Watson moves across and works the ball through square leg
Malinga to Hussey, no run good length and very straight, Hussey defends towards the bowler
Malinga to Hussey, 1 wide good length but the line is down leg side
Malinga to Hussey, no run good length outside off stump, Hussey strides out and forward arms
Malinga to Hussey, no run good leave, close to off stump, Malinga's upping his pace now
Malinga to Hussey, no run good length on middle and off, Hussey pushes off the front foot towards cover
Malinga to Hussey, 5 wide Malinga loses his line, firing it down leg side, Sangakkara should have stopped that though, but it's cost Sri Lanka five extras
Malinga to Hussey, no run played off the front foot towards the off side
Malinga to Hussey, no run good length and straight, Hussey defends towards cover
Kulasekara to Watson, no run nudged away into the off side off the front foot
Kulasekara to Watson, no run short of a good length outside off, rocks forward and defends it into the off side
Kulasekara to Watson, 1 run good length on the off, rocks forward and pushes it on the up past extra cover for a single
Kulasekara to Hussey, no run short of a good length on middle, Hussey rocks back and defends it into the off side
Kulasekara to Hussey, no run slightly short on leg stump, gets on the back foot and pats it back down the pitch
Kulasekara to Hussey, no run shortish on the off, Hussey gets his body behind that one nicely and defends it in the off side
Angelo Mathews to Watson, no run pitched on the off stump, drives it firmly towards mid-on off the front foot
Angelo Mathews to Watson, 1 run shortish outside off, cut down towards third man for a single
Angelo Mathews to Hussey, 1 run shortish on leg stump, turns it behind square for a quick single
Angelo Mathews to Watson, no run back of a length outside off, punches it towards cover, straight to the fielder
Angelo Mathews to Watson, no run angling in towards middle, gets front and across and works it towards midwicket
Angelo Mathews to Watson, no run short of a good length on the off, gets back and punches it to the bowler
Kulasekara to Hussey, no run pushed it full on leg stump, it's driven straight to midwicket
Kulasekara to Hussey, no run short of a good length on middle, Hussey moves right back and knocks it into the off side
Kulasekara to Hussey, no run slightly short on leg stump, aiming well, Hussey drops it down in front of the bowler
Kulasekara to Hussey, FOUR runs plenty of width this time, errs in line and is punished, Hussey sees an opportunity and promptly dispatches that one through point
Kulasekara to Hussey, no run on leg and middle, Hussey gets across slightly and plays it watchfully to midwicket
Kulasekara to Hussey, no run in the channel just outside off stump, steps forward, opens the face slightly and guides it to point
Angelo Mathews to Watson, no run short of a good length outside off, is a legcutter, Watson tries to cut but can't make contact
Angelo Mathews to Watson, no run short of a good length on the off, gets forward and taps it towards point
Angelo Mathews to Watson, no run back of a length on the off, Watson stands tall and offers the full face
Angelo Mathews to Watson, no run bowled on a good length on the off, defended solidly in front of the short extra cover fielder
Angelo Mathews to Watson, 2 runs angling in towards middle and leg, flicked away wide of fine leg for a couple of runs, good wristwork there
Angelo Mathews to Watson, no run short of a good length on the off, gets forward and taps it in front of cover
Senanayake to Hussey, 2 wide the first ball is down leg side from round the wicket and Hussey misses the pull
Senanayake to Watson, 1 run Watson goes back and cuts towards cover where Chandimal dives and stops the ball
Senanayake to Hussey, no run defended on the leg side
Senanayake to Hussey, no run played off the back foot on the off side
Senanayake to Hussey, no run tossed up on middle stump, defended on the front foot towards the off side
Senanayake to Hussey, no run defended from the crease towards the off side again
Senanayake to Hussey, no run Hussey moves across and nudges behind square
Angelo Mathews to Watson, no run good length and straight from Mathews, Watson defends on the off side
Angelo Mathews to Watson, 1 run a little width outside off and Watson stays in his crease to cut towards third man
Angelo Mathews to Hussey, no run good length on middle stump, Hussey gets behind the line and defends
Angelo Mathews to Hussey, no run pushed from the crease towards cover
Angelo Mathews to Hussey, no run Hussey watchfully defends towards the bowler

Angelo Mathews to Hussey, no run short and wide outside off stump, after so many tight deliveries, Hussey pounces, cutting hard towards point. Dilshan is in the way, though, and he dives full length towards his left to bring the ball down. Saved four runs.
Senanayake to Watson, 1 run Watson works the ball through midwicket for a single
Senanayake to Hussey, no run Hussey comes forward and dabs on the leg side
Senanayake to Hussey, 1 run Hussey moves back and pushes towards square leg
Senanayake to Watson, 1 run Watson clips the ball off his pads through square to bring up the 50 for Australia
Senanayake to Hussey, no run Hussey strides forward and nudges on the off side, he wants one, Watson doesn't
Senanayake to Hussey, no run tight line and length on middle and off, Hussey defends from his crease

Angelo Mathews to Watson, 2 runs shot! Mathews does well to not get hurt. Watson thumped the ball off the front foot back at the bowler, technically it was a catch, because Mathews got a hand to it. The ball deflected and went towards the long-on boundary
Angelo Mathews to Watson, no run Watson tries to drive but gets an inside edge towards square leg
Angelo Mathews to Watson, no run defended on the front foot towards the bowler
Angelo Mathews to Watson, 1 run the length is fuller and the line just outside off, Watson dabs the ball past a wide slip towards third man
Angelo Mathews to Hussey, no run Hussey stays in his crease and defends towards point
Angelo Mathews to Hussey, no run Hussey gets drawn on to the front foot and beaten by a good length ball that pitches around off and seams away
Senanayake to Watson, no run good length on off stump, Watson defends
Senanayake to Watson, no run Watson comes forward and defends on the leg side

Senanayake to Watson, FOUR runs short ball and Watson hammers through square leg. That was hit in the air in the vicinity of Chandimal and the square leg umpire, both men could have been in danger. He smashed it
Senanayake to Watson, 2 runs played behind square for two more
Senanayake to Watson, no run defended back to the bowler
Senanayake to Watson, 1 run Watson moves forward and drives the ball through midwicket
Perera to Watson, 1 run short of a length close to off from over the wicket, Watson stays in his crease and opens the face to play towards third man
Perera to Hussey, 1 run Hussey opens the face this time, to play towards third man
Perera to Watson, 1 run Watson moves back and nudges the ball off his thigh towards square leg
Perera to Hussey, 1 run Chandimal threw at the keeper's end and Sangakkara did well to dive and save overthrows. The ball was played towards cover for a quick single
Perera to Watson, FOUR runs that's too full on the pads, Watson clips the ball through square leg and the ball screams across the turf to the boundary
Thirimanne to Watson, 1 run decent length outside off, played towards third man for a single
Senanayake to Watson, no run Watson moves forward and defends
Senanayake to Watson, 1 run Watson goes back and flicks for a single
Senanayake to Hussey, 2 runs Hussey steps out and clips the ball through midwicket
Senanayake to Hussey, 1 run Hussey moves back again and dabs towards square leg
Senanayake to Watson, no run Watson gets on to the front foot and defends
Senanayake to Watson, no run Watson moves forward and hits the ball hard into the ground towards midwicket, where Dilshan dives to his left and fields
Kulasekara to Hussey, no run good length around off stump, defended on the back foot towards point
Kulasekara to Hussey, FOUR runs that's only a bit short and Hussey launches it over midwicket with a powerful pull, he hit that flat and hard
Kulasekara to Hussey, FOUR runs full ball outside off, Hussey moves forward and drives the ball along the ground through cover, superb timing
Kulasekara to Hussey, no run defended on the off side
Kulasekara to Hussey, 1 run good length on leg and middle, Hussey nudges towards midwicket and runs
Kulasekara to Watson, 1 run width outside off, so Watson cuts towards third man
Senanayake to Watson, no run Watson steps out and defends on the off side
Senanayake to Watson, no run defended on the off side
Senanayake to Watson, 1 run short ball and Watson loses balance as he pulls, maybe tried to hit it a bit too hard
Senanayake to Hussey, 1 run Hussey nudges the ball into the gap at midwicket and runs, the bowler has to field it himself
Senanayake to Watson, no run Watson moves forward and turns the ball off his pads to square leg

Senanayake to Watson, FOUR runs there he goes! Watson down on one knee and swinging the bat hard, lofting the ball towards the midwicket boundary, the ball falls wide of the fielder for a one-bounce four
Thirimanne to Hussey, no run defended from the crease on the off side
Thirimanne to Hussey, 1 run cut off the back foot towards third man
Thirimanne to Watson, 1 run good length and straight, medium pace from Thirimanne, Watson drives to long-on
Thirimanne to Hussey, 1 run Hussey pushes through cover off the front foot
Thirimanne to Watson, FOUR runs Watson gets on the front foot, lines up a length ball, and swings hard to send the ball straight back over the bowler's head
Thirimanne to Watson, no run Watson defends on the front foot and gets an inside edge on to the pad
Herath to Hussey, 1 run Hussey gets down and across, paddling the ball on the full towards fine leg
Herath to Watson, no run Watson defends on the leg side
Herath to Watson, no run Watson stays in his crease and defends again
Herath to Watson, 2 runs Watson works the ball off his pads behind square
Herath to Watson, 1 run Watson brings up the 100 with a dab off the pads
Herath to Hussey, 1 run pushed into the gap between cover and point for one
Thirimanne to Hussey, no run Hussey gets beaten poking outside off stump
Thirimanne to Hussey, 1 run full ball on the pads, clipped through midwicket
Thirimanne to Watson, no run defended on the front foot towards the bowler
Thirimanne to Watson, 2 runs Wason gets to his fifty by lofting the ball past the bowler, not really a chance
Thirimanne to Watson, 1 run Watson gets on to the front foot and hits the ball hard through cover
Thirimanne to Hussey, 1 run short ball, Hussey pulls through midwicket
Herath to Hussey, no run Hussey stays in his crease, gets behind the line, and blocks
Herath to Hussey, no run Hussey goes back and plays behind point
Herath to Hussey, no run Hussey steers off the back foot again but doesn't beat point
Herath to Hussey, no run played back towards the bowler on the back foot
Herath to Hussey, 1 run Hussey nudges towards point off the front foot and runs
Herath to Watson, 1 run Watson nudges the ball off his pads behind square
Thirimanne to Watson, 2 runs length ball outside off, Watson cuts towards deep point and the batsmen take on the throw from the deep from Tharanga and run the second
Thirimanne to Watson, 1 run played through cover for a single
Thirimanne to Hussey, 1 run full ball on the pads, Hussey clips through midwicket
Thirimanne to Watson, no run defended on the front foot on the off side
Thirimanne to Watson, 1 run Watson strides forward and drills the ball back past the bowler
Herath to Watson, no run huge appeal for lbw after Watson pushes forward and gets hit on the pad. That was going on with the arm and looked like it would have missed leg stump
Herath to Watson, 1 run played on the off side for a single
Herath to Hussey, 2 runs Hussey gets off the mark by turning the ball of his pads behind square
Herath to Hussey, no run Hussey nudges off the front foot to Chandimal at short square leg
Herath to Hussey, no run defended on the off side
Herath to Hussey, (no ball) 2 runs Hussey calls for two as soon as he drives the ball through cover and into the gap in the deep
Herath to Hussey, no run nudged off the front foot on the leg side
Thirimanne to Watson, 1 run Watson moves forward and drives the ball in the air but wide of the fielder at short cover
Thirimanne to Hussey, 2 runs Hussey uses the width outside off to cut the ball past Dilshan at point
Thirimanne to Hussey, 3 runs width outside off once again and Hussey cuts towards deep point, Kulasekara sprints to his right along the boundary and dives to save one run
Thirimanne to Watson, no run played off the front foot towards cover point
Thirimanne to Watson, no run Watson strides forward and defends to cover
Thirimanne to Watson, 1 run Watson moves forward and across and works the ball through midwicket
Herath to Watson, 1 run short ball and Watson pulls towards deep midwicket
Herath to Hussey, no run Hussey nudges the ball from his crease behind square
Herath to Hussey, no run defended on the front foot towards the bowler
Herath to Hussey, no run defended on the leg side
Herath to Hussey, FOUR runs Hussey cashes in on the leg-stump line and sweeps with power to the square leg boundary
Herath to Hussey, no run defended on the front foot towards the off side
Malinga to Watson, 1 run good length and straight, Watson dabs towards square leg and runs
Malinga to Hussey, no run short and wide outside off, Hussey reaches for it without moving his feet and makes no contact
Malinga to Hussey, no run good length close to off stump, left alone by the batsman
Malinga to Hussey, no run Hussey got an inside edge on to the pad against a straight delivery, else that would have been dead plumb
Malinga to Hussey, no run played from the crease towards cover
Malinga to Hussey, no run full and straight, Hussey plays the ball to mid-on
Herath to Watson, 1 run Watson steps out of his crease and clips the ball off his pads through midwicket
Herath to Hussey, 1 run driven off the front foot towards long-off
Herath to Watson, 1 wide bowled flat and down leg side, that's a wide
Herath to Watson, no run defended on the front foot back to the bowler
Herath to Watson, no run Watson defends back to Herath once again
Herath to Watson, 1 run Watson steps out and drives the ball to long on
Herath to Hussey, 1 run driven off the front foot past the bowler to mid-on, they run a quick single and the throw to the keeper is poor
Malinga to Hussey, 1 run short and wide outside off, cut to the fielder at deep point
Malinga to Watson, no run Malinga digs it in short, the batsmen sways and bends his knees to let the bouncer pass
Malinga to Watson, 1 run another short ball, this time Watson pulls, a controlled shot along the ground
Malinga to Hussey, 1 run full and straight, played down the ground and the runs needed by Australia dip below 100
Malinga to Watson, no run played off the front foot towards midwicket
Herath to Hussey, no run played back to the bowler from the crease
Herath to Hussey, no run driven firmly, Herath dives full stretch to his left to field
Herath to Hussey, no run Hussey goes back to cut but gets an inside edge into the ground near his boot
Herath to Hussey, no run nudged off the pad to the fielder at short square leg
Herath to Hussey, no run defended on the front foot on the off side
Herath to Hussey, 2 runs Hussey nudges the ball behind square
Malinga to Christian, no run good length outside off, Christian shoulders arms, that was 146 kph. The crowd were roaring as Malinga ran in, great atmosphere at the G
Malinga to Christian, 2 runs full ball on the pads, Christian clips it in the air through midwicket
Malinga to Christian, no run a slower and straight full toss, Christian wasn't fooled, he met it with a straight and sure bat
Malinga to Christian, no run 143 kph on a good length outside off, Christian tries to defend but gets beaten
Malinga to Christian, no run good length and straight, Christian gets behind the line and defends
Malinga to Christian, no run that looked like a slower bouncer outside off stump, Christian let it go through to Sanga
Senanayake to Hussey, FOUR runs Hussey uses the width outside off to cut to the third man boundary, poor line and length to start with after the break
Senanayake to Hussey, 1 run played down the ground to long on for a single
Senanayake to Christian, 1 run Christian pushes off the front foot towards point and runs
Senanayake to Hussey, 1 run played off the front foot through point
Senanayake to Pattinson, no run The Sri Lankans appeal for a catch down leg side after Pattinson misses the glance, there were two sounds but maybe the ball brushed pad
Dilshan to Hussey, 2 wide his first ball is short and extremely far down leg side
Dilshan to Pattinson, 1 run hit off the back foot through cover for a single
Dilshan to Hussey, 1 run pushed on the front foot towards point
Dilshan to Pattinson, no run Pattinson gets on to the front foot and blocks
Dilshan to Pattinson, no run played off the back foot towards cover
Dilshan to Pattinson, FOUR runs that's too short, Pattinson goes back and uses the width to cut the ball behind point to the boundary
Dilshan to Pattinson, no run Pattinson goes back again and cuts from off stump towards cover
Senanayake to Hussey, no run a bit too short but Hussey can't cut it past Malinga at point
Senanayake to Hussey, 3 runs fuller length and Hussey drives it into the gap at extra cover, they run extremely well between wickets and complete three
Senanayake to Pattinson, no run punched off the back foot towards the bowler's right, Senanayake dives and makes the save
Senanayake to Pattinson, no run played firmly off the pads to midwicket, where there's another diving save
Senanayake to Pattinson, no run played towards cover off the back foot
Senanayake to Pattinson, no run cut off the back foot to the fielder at backward point, the crowd is cheering every dot ball
Kulasekara to Hussey, 2 runs driven of the front foot through point and the runnign between the wickets is slick
Kulasekara to Hussey, 1 run Hussey stays in his crease and punches through cover
Kulasekara to Pattinson, no run length ball around off stump, Pattinson stays in his crease and plays to cover
Kulasekara to Pattinson, 1 run played from the crease towards point where Dilshan makes a lazy attempt of picking up with one hand and misses the ball
Kulasekara to Hussey, no run full and straight, driven off the front foot towards cover
Kulasekara to Hussey, no run Hussey drives towards cover but watches his shot blocked by Senanayake who dives to his left
Senanayake to Pattinson, no run defended from the crease
Senanayake to Pattinson, 1 run worked off the pads towards square leg
Senanayake to Hussey, FOUR runs Hussey attacks, lofting the ball flat but high enough to clear the fielder at mid-off, a game of chess this is becoming
Senanayake to Hussey, no run played back to the bowler this time
Senanayake to Hussey, no run Hussey comes forward and drives the ball towards Malinga at point
Senanayake to Hussey, 1 run Hussey gets on the front foot and taps the ball down to long-on
Kulasekara to Hussey, no run driven firmly back towards the bowler and Kulasekara fields it, not cleanly, but well enough to prevent a single
Kulasekara to Hussey, no run defended from the crease towards point
Kulasekara to Hussey, no run played off the front foot towards cover

Kulasekara to Hussey, no run a huge appeal for lbw after Hussey gets hit on the pad, I think there was an inside edge there, the ball went to the keeper, and Sanga underarmed it on to the stumps. Asad Rauf has had a word with Mahela about that appeal. Replays indicate no inside edge, but the ball was just grazing the stumps. So fair call from the umpire
Kulasekara to Hussey, no run defended on the front foot towards the off side
Kulasekara to Hussey, no run played off the front foot towards midwicket, Kulasekara has bowled a maiden
Senanayake to Pattinson, no run played back to the bowler from the crease
Senanayake to Pattinson, no run the bowler leaps to his left to parry the ball toward the fielder at midwicket, preventing the single
Senanayake to Pattinson, no run Pattinson goes back and tries to cut but is beaten
Senanayake to Pattinson, 1 wide that's down leg side and a wide
Senanayake to Pattinson, no run Pattinson gets an inside edge on to the pad
Senanayake to Pattinson, 2 runs forced of the back foot through midwicket
Senanayake to Pattinson, 3 runs Pattinson releases some pressure by driving the ball in the air over cover to add three more runs
Herath to Pattinson, no run Pattinson goes back to defend and gets hit on the pad
Herath to Pattinson, no run quicker and straighter ball, Pattinson plays off the back foot to midwicket
Herath to McKay, no run flat ball on off and middle, defended on the front foot
Herath to McKay, 1 run McKay was aiming for midwicket but the ball was slower and he hit it in the air through square leg
Herath to Hussey, no run driven back to the bowler, Herath dives to his left to prevent the single
Senanayake to McKay, no run a full toss on off stump, a real loose ball, but it's played to cover
Senanayake to McKay, 1 run played off the back foot towards long on
Senanayake to Hussey, 1 run Hussey comes forward and works the ball through square leg
Senanayake to McKay, 1 run driven off the front foot towards long off for one more
Senanayake to Hussey, 1 run Hussey collects a single to long-on
Senanayake to McKay, 1 run McKay goes back and pushes towards point
Herath to McKay, 1 run that's swung in the air behind square but it falls short of the fielder in the deep
Herath to Hussey, 1 run driven off the front foot to long-on
Herath to McKay, 1 run McKay nudges off the front foot towards midwicket
Herath to Hussey, no run cut off the back foot, there's a fumble at point but no run taken
Herath to Doherty, no run Doherty strides forward and defends on the off side

Malinga to Hussey, 2 runs slower ball outside off stump, Hussey plays it through cover point and runs one, and then sprints back for the second. The throw is to Sangakkara and he breaks the stumps, Hussey is home safe though
Malinga to Hussey, 1 run Hussey drives to long off and gets only one this time
Malinga to Doherty, 1 run that's too full and on the pads, Doherty clips the ball firmly to deep square leg
Malinga to Hussey, 3 runs a yorker and Hussey somehow edges it past the fielder at short fine leg, the fielder from deep square leg runs to his right and slides to save the four
Malinga to Doherty, 1 run once again Malinga's line to the left hander is poor, on leg stump, Doherty dabs towards midwicket and runs, Malinga has to do the fielding himself
Malinga to Hussey, 1 run full and straight, Hussey drives to long-on to retain strike
Kulasekara to Hussey, FOUR runs that's a great shot! Hussey attacks Kulasekara, carting him to the extra cover boundary to reach his half-century. Superb innings, dragging Australia ahead
Kulasekara to Hussey, no run in the blockhole outside off stump, Hussey gets beaten
Kulasekara to Hussey, 1 run in the blockhole once again, Hussy squeezes it out to point for a single
Kulasekara to Doherty, 1 run Doherty was well out of his crease as he met the ball on the full, pushing towards mid-off for a single
Kulasekara to Hussey, 2 runs Hussey makes room and then jams down on a full ball outside off, placing it behind point towards Herath at wide third man
Kulasekara to Hussey, 1 run full outside off once again, Hussey drives to deep cover and retains strike
Herath to Hussey, 1 run Hussey beats the fielder at extra cover with the drive but the man at long-off runs in quickly to prevent the second run
Herath to Doherty, 1 run cut off the back foot through point
Herath to Hussey, 1 run Hussey steps out of his crease and plays to Kulasekara at short fine leg, the throw is awful but Doherty had run too far past the crease to capitalise and take an overthrow
Herath to Doherty, no run defended on the leg side
Herath to Doherty, no run Doherty defends watchfully back to the bowler, the crowd cheer, but Doherty is keeping a cool head here
Herath to Doherty, 1 wide that's fired down leg side, a costly extra for Sri Lanka
Herath to Doherty, 1 run
Malinga to Doherty, no run full ball on leg stump, but Doherty can't get it past midwicket
Malinga to Doherty, 1 run played with soft hands close on the off side for a quick single, the fielder from point picks up and throws down the stumps at the bowler's end, but Doherty is safe

Malinga to Hussey, 2 runs full and wide outside off, Hussey drives it in the air, the fielder at cover dives to his left and gets hands to it but the ball goes past him towards the deep, a tough chance
Malinga to Hussey, 1 run pulled to Chandimal at midwicket, a direct hit at the bowler's end would have dismissed Hussey
Malinga to Doherty, 1 run a low full toss outside off, Doherty pushes towards long off for a single, Malinga's line is all over the place
Malinga to Hussey, 1 run full toss once again, allowing Hussey to drive easily through cover and retain strike
Herath to Hussey, SIX runs shot! Hussey has charged Herath and sent the ball into the stands with a clean swing of the bat, straight as the proverbial arrow
Herath to Hussey, 2 runs two two two, says Hussey the moment he clips the ball through midwicket, he runs superbly as well
Herath to Hussey, 1 run two two two, he calls once again after playing the ball through square. Doherty says no, and they settle for one. the second would have been supremely risky for the batsmen
Herath to Doherty, no run Doherty defends towards backward point, Hussey decides not to run
Herath to Doherty, no run Doherty tries to cut but gets beaten outside off stump
Herath to Doherty, no run driven firmly but straight to the bowler, a tight finish from Herath after that first-ball six
Malinga to Hussey, 1 run a full ball on off stump, Hussey mis-times the ball towards midwicket

Malinga to Hussey, 2 runs full ball wide outside off stump, Hussey digs it out past the fielder at point and runs the second before the fielder from third man can run to his right and prevent it. Poor line once again
Malinga to Hussey, 1 run full and straight, Hussey drives the ball down the ground and long-off runs in fast to prevent the second, Dilshan was the fielder and he was quick
Malinga to Hilfenhaus, no run a full toss and Malinga is appealing for something, I think it hit the inside edge and then went on to the pad and past the keeper, they did not run
Malinga to Hilfenhaus, no run phew, that's a fast ball outside off, close to the stumps, Hilfenhaus gets beaten but he also survives, Hussey to face the start of the final over

Kulasekara to Hussey, OUT Sri Lanka have won! Hussey has been caught at long off, and listen to the MCG erupt! Mahela Jayawardene is ecstatic. Hussey decided to attack Kulasekara and lofted him down the ground, he hit the full ball flat but not far enough, Dilshan was the man at long-off and he held the catch to send the fans at the MCG into wild celebrations. Sri Lanka have played a tremendous game and are in the finals
It's been quite a game. I hope you enjoyed following it as much as I did bringing it to you. Thank you for all the emails. Cheers.

Jayawardene's voice is hoarse, he's been screaming his head off no doubt. He says it's too early to be sure about the status of the injured players - Perera, Mathews and Maharoof. He gives credit to Sanga and Dilshan for helping him tactically on the field.

Dinesh Chandimal is the Man of the Match for his half-century. He's the top scorer of the series, and batted with admirable temperament today after Sri Lanka had lost two early wickets. He scored briskly, taking pressure of Sangakkara, and kept Sri Lanka going.
Watson says he's sure Clarke will be fit for Sunday's first of three finals.

A word about this crowd today. The Sri Lankans turned up in large numbers and made themselves heard. There was music, dancing and a lot of good cheer. More than one person compared the atmosphere to what you'd find at the Premadasa.

10.25 pm Sri Lanka needed to prevent Australia from winning to make the finals of the triangular series. They were on course for a huge total before the middle and lower order failed and they finished on 238. Mahela Jayawardene then lost two bowlers, Perera to a side strain and Mathews to a calf injury. He kept his nerve and maintained attacking fields throughout to lead his team to a superb victory. They have qualified for the final on top of the league. A f
Sri Lanka won by 9 runs
Player of the match is Dinesh Chandimal, SL
